alerts.text: All of my mods are working with the Businesses & Hobbies EP and its associated patches.

Language Barriers was updated to v2.6 to add Nordska (for Nordhaven), and again to v2.7 to add Ravena (for Ravenwood). As always, the EPs associated with these worlds are NOT required to use these languages, and LB remains fully compatible with the Base Game.
